marklogic.body: OMG!!! I cannot believe how excellent this movie is *squee* !! The honeymoon....no words at the hotness *fans self*! The was incredible all around, no "awkward" moments of Acting (you all know what I mean!) Rob is just all sorts of HOT this time around:) The wedding dress was gorgeous and Kristen looked amazing! Her body is incredible! One part was totally cheezy though! When Jacob leaves the pack. I thought Sam sounded like God or something! But it had to be in the wolfs' minds, I just didn't care for the way the voices sounded. And it ended exactly how I thought it would! Those Red eyes...excellent! Now, we start another year long wait!
